statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Recently, lxhgww received a task : to generate strings contain '0's and '1's only, in which '0' appears exactly m times, '1' appears exactly n times. Also, any prefix string of it must satisfy the situation that the number of 1's  can not be smaller than the number of 0's . But he can't calculate the number of satisfied strings. Can you help him?

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
T(T<=100) in the first line is the case number.
Each case contains two numbers n and m( 1 <= m <= n <= 1000000 ).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Output the number of satisfied strings % 20100501.
